title: How to Post Multiple Pictures in a Single Tweet on Twitter

steps.title: Log in to Twitter
steps.content: Log in to Twitter . Go to twitter.com in your browser and sign in with your account.

steps.title: Compose a new Tweet.
steps.content: Compose a new Tweet. Hit the Tweet button, at the top bar and write something under 280 characters in the Tweet box.

steps.title: Add an image to your Tweet
steps.content: Add an image to your Tweet . Click on the photo icon from the bottom of the Tweet box and select an image from your computer.

steps.title: Add more images to your Tweet.
steps.content: Add more images to your Tweet. Click on the photo icon again choose another image from your computer. You can select up to 4 photos.

steps.title: Post your Tweet.
steps.content: Post your Tweet. Click on the Tweet button to post it on X.

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. Click on each picture to see full size. Finished!
